body:
Step 1: Rush

Step 2: You may only kill up to 5 players.

Step 3: Fist the monument to death.

Step 4: Record and post!
body_tagged:
Step 1: Rush

Step 2: You may only kill up to 5 players.

Step 3: Fist the monument to death.

Step 4: Record and post!
title: Badger's Nebula Challenge! EPISODE #2

replies.body:
LOL this is a lot harder than the previous one. Do I have to kill 5 players, or can I not kill anyone at all?
I'll do this when I can play.
replies.body_tagged:
LOL this is a lot harder than the previous one. Do I have to kill 5 players, or can I not kill anyone at all?
I'll do this when I can play.

replies.body: You dont have to kill them :) but if you kill 6, you fail.
replies.body_tagged: You dont have to kill them :) but if you kill 6, you fail.

replies.body_tagged: Im on a kindle and hour vid isnt available on mobile. ;(

replies.body:
Ooh, I have a good idea :o
You have to stay in the center of the map for 5 minutes without dying. You must wear the apparel you spawn with. You also can't hide or anything of the sort, you have to be right where the fights are gravitated towards. I know you can do this quite easily on maps with a lot of void, but try it on other maps for more fun and a challenge :3
